text: thought big huh this is the short
summary of PUC table a spicy stir fry of
fish with a ton of herbs for the full
version the link is just right below
let's get started
Pao together garlic cilantro roots Thai
chilies white peppercorns and a spur
chili get it to a rough paste just like
this heat a little oil in a wok or a
saute pan then add our herb paste once
the garlic starts to turn color add the
fish and give it a quick toss to mix
with the pace add fish sauce sugar and a
little bit of water then add gonna tie
or finger roots and young peppercorns
toss it a few more times and then just
let the fish cook flip them halfway
through an admiral water or stock if it
gets dry when the fish is done toss it a
bunch of Taipei's oh and that's that
serve with some jasmine rice and it
makes for a healthy easy and delicious
meal for the full recipe with all the
details you can click right here or in
the link below if you enjoy the show
please click to subscribe and I will see
